verses.kjv: Wherefore when we could no longer forbear, we thought it good to be left at Athens alone;
verses.web: Therefore when we couldn’t stand it any longer, we thought it good to be left behind at Athens alone,
verses.ct: Eventually we just couldn't take it anymore. So we decided to stay behind in Athens by ourselves

verses.kjv: And sent Timotheus, our brother, and minister of God, and our fellowlabourer in the gospel of Christ, to establish you, and to comfort you concerning your faith:
verses.web: and sent Timothy, our brother and God’s servant in the Good News of Christ, to establish you, and to comfort you concerning your faith,
verses.ct: and sent Timothy to you — our brother and God's servant in spreading the good news of Christ. We sent him to strengthen you and encourage you in your faith,

verses.kjv: That no man should be moved by these afflictions: for yourselves know that we are appointed thereunto.
verses.web: that no one would be moved by these afflictions. For you know that we are appointed to this task.
verses.ct: so that none of you would be shaken by the hardships you were facing. You already know that suffering like this is part of what we've been called to.

verses.kjv: For verily, when we were with you, we told you before that we should suffer tribulation; even as it came to pass, and ye know.
verses.web: For most certainly, when we were with you, we told you beforehand that we are to suffer affliction, even as it happened, and you know.
verses.ct: Even when we were still with you, we warned you that we would face persecution — and that's exactly what happened, as you well know.

verses.kjv: For this cause, when I could no longer forbear, I sent to know your faith, lest by some means the tempter have tempted you, and our labour be in vain.
verses.web: For this cause I also, when I couldn’t stand it any longer, sent that I might know your faith, for fear that by any means the tempter had tempted you, and our labor would have been in vain.
verses.ct: That's why, when I couldn't stand the uncertainty any longer, I sent Timothy to find out how your faith was holding up. I was afraid the tempter might have gotten to you and all our hard work would have been for nothing.

verses.kjv: But now when Timotheus came from you unto us, and brought us good tidings of your faith and charity, and that ye have good remembrance of us always, desiring greatly to see us, as we also to see you:
verses.web: But when Timothy came just now to us from you, and brought us glad news of your faith and love, and that you have good memories of us always, longing to see us, even as we also long to see you,
verses.ct: But Timothy has just now come back to us from you, and he brought wonderful news about your faith and love. He told us that you always think of us fondly and that you long to see us — just as much as we long to see you.

verses.kjv: Therefore, brethren, we were comforted over you in all our affliction and distress by your faith:
verses.web: for this cause, brothers, we were comforted over you in all our distress and affliction through your faith.
verses.ct: Because of this, brothers and sisters, your faith has been a tremendous comfort to us in the middle of all our own troubles and hardships.

verses.kjv: For now we live, if ye stand fast in the Lord.
verses.web: For now we live, if you stand fast in the Lord.
verses.ct: Knowing that you are standing firm in the Lord — that gives us life.

verses.kjv: For what thanks can we render to God again for you, for all the joy wherewith we joy for your sakes before our God;
verses.web: For what thanksgiving can we render again to God for you, for all the joy with which we rejoice for your sakes before our God,
verses.ct: How could we ever thank God enough for you? The joy we feel because of you when we stand before our God is overwhelming.

verses.kjv: Night and day praying exceedingly that we might see your face, and might perfect that which is lacking in your faith?
verses.web: night and day praying exceedingly that we may see your face, and may perfect that which is lacking in your faith?
verses.ct: Night and day we pray with everything in us that we'll get to see you face to face and help fill in whatever is still missing in your faith.

verses.kjv: Now God himself and our Father, and our Lord Jesus Christ, direct our way unto you.
verses.web: Now may our God and Father himself, and our Lord Jesus Christ, direct our way to you.
verses.ct: May God our Father himself, and our Lord Jesus Christ, clear the way for us to come to you.

verses.kjv: And the Lord make you to increase and abound in love one toward another, and toward all men, even as we do toward you:
verses.web: May the Lord make you to increase and abound in love toward one another, and toward all men, even as we also do toward you,
verses.ct: And may the Lord cause your love to grow and overflow — love for each other and for everyone — just as our love overflows for you.

verses.kjv: To the end he may stablish your hearts unblameable in holiness before God, even our Father, at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ with all his saints.
verses.web: to the end he may establish your hearts blameless in holiness before our God and Father at the coming of our Lord Jesus with all his saints.
verses.ct: May he strengthen your hearts so that you will be blameless and holy before God our Father when our Lord Jesus comes with all his saints.
